title: 30 Things on Sale You’ll Actually Want to Buy: From Fjällräven to J. Crew
text:
30 items in this article 29 items on sale! Photo: courtesy of the retailers

You may have noticed some posts from our friends at the Strategist on the Cut. They’ll be dropping in every now and again, sharing their expertise on the basics you don’t have time to research and the weird and wonderful things you don’t yet know you need.

This week’s dive into the best of the internet’s sales bins includes various leopard-print bags, a Strategist-approved mattress, and a zippy shower curtain from Marimekko.

Madewell Sidewalk Low-Top Sneakers in Colorblock Suede $60 (was $88, now 32% off) These come courtesy of Sidewalk, Madewell’s line of sneakers that have a Vans-like look but are apparently more comfortable thanks to their MWL Cloudlift insoles. $60 at Madewell Buy

Coach Kitt Messenger Crossbody $120 (was $150, now 20% off) There’s a sale at Coach where items up to $400 are 20 percent off while items $400 and over are 30 percent off. This super-simple cross-body bag (this style is on sale somewhat regularly, but very rarely in black) is a good thing to pick up. $120 at Coach Buy with code: FALL19

Coach Bowery Bootie $180 (was $225, now 20% off) The “bead chain” trim is a nice touch. $180 at Coach Buy with code: FALL19

Braun Classic BNC002 Clock in White $25 (was $35, now 29% off) A classic, Dieter Rams–designed alarm clock from Braun. $25 at Need Supply Co. Buy

Levi's Wedgie Icon Jeans, These Dreams $78 (was $98, now 20% off) As we noted the other day, Shopbop is having quite the sale, where pretty much everything under $500 is 20 percent off, and everything over $500 is 25 percent off. We highlighted a different pair of Levi’s earlier today, but wanted to note that these “low stretch” Wedgie jeans from Levi’s are also 20 percent off. Note: The sale ends today (Friday). $78 at Shopbop Buy with code: STOCKUP19

Superga 2750 Cotu Classic Sneakers $52 (was $65, now 20% off) These classic white Supergas would look great with the aforementioned jeans. $52 at Shopbop Buy with code: STOCKUP19

Baggu Duck Bag, Leopard $27 (was $34, now 21% off) A leopard-print Baggu is a safe way to experiment with leopard print. $27 at Shopbop Buy with code: STOCKUP19

Fjallraven Kanken Backpack $64 (was $80, now 20% off) If you’ve been meaning to jump on the Fjällräven train … now’s a good time. $64 at Shopbop Buy with code: STOCKUP19

Woolrich W's Luxury Arctic Parka $638 (was $850, now 25% off) If you’re willing to spend a little more, that’s where the real deals come in: For instance, this incredibly warm and stylish Woolrich parka is $213 cheaper than usual. $638 at Shopbop Buy with code: STOCKUP19

Sandy Liang Dean Fleece Jacket $446 (was $595, now 25% off) A status fleece from Sandy Liang. $446 at Shopbop Buy with code: STOCKUP19

Filson Tote Bag without Zipper $156 (was $195, now 20% off) We rounded up the deals yesterday from Shopbop’s brother site, East Dane (the same type of sale is going on), and just wanted to call out this Filson tote as being a particularly great deal. $156 at East Dane Buy with code: STOCKUP19

Farberware Colourworks 12 Piece Resin Stick Resistant Knife Set $12 (was $19, now 37% off) This knife set would make a great housewarming/hostess gift. $12 at Walmart Buy

Cuisinart Prodigy 2 Qt. Tea Kettle-Red $28 (was $39, now 28% off) A bright-red tea kettle (kept out on the stove) is a nice way to gussy up a kitchen. $28 at Walmart Buy

Nars Makeup Your Mind Eye & Cheek Palette $35 (was $49, now 29% off) All of your everyday facial powder needs (several shades of blush, eyeshadow, and bronzer) in one snazzy palette, courtesy of Nars. $35 at Ulta Beauty Buy

Nike Women's Revolution 4 Running Sneakers $40 (was $50, now 20% off) A very basic (and yet elegant in its basic-ness) pair of Nike running shoes. $40 at Macy's Buy

Marimekko Pienet Kivet Shower Curtain $66 (was $110, now 40% off) A festive shower curtain courtesy of Marimekko. $66 at Macy's Buy

Pendleton 5th Avenue Fringed Wool Throw $132 (was $330, now 60% off) A cozy Pendleton throw for the cozy season ahead. $132 at Macy's Buy with code: SALES

Clare V. Chou Chou Pouch $161 (was $325, now 50% off) The second leopard-print bag of our roundup, this one from Clare V. (Note: All sale items at Anthro are an extra 30 percent off, and discounts are applied at checkout.) $161 at Anthropologie Buy

Indalia Wall Hanging $63 (was $128, now 51% off) This hand-embroidered wall hanging would look nice on a bedroom wall, or in a kid’s room. $63 at Anthropologie Buy

Farm Rio Valentina Maxi Dress $105 (was $230, now 54% off) A very autumnal maxi dress from Anthro Plus. $105 at Anthropologie Buy

Anthropologie Lovell Chair $118 (was $148, now 20% off) Breaking sale news: We just learned that Anthropologie is having a 48-hour “flash sale,” where a wide selection of furniture is up to 30 percent off. This dining chair is modern, minimalist, and a lot more expensive-looking than it is. $118 at Anthropologie Buy

J. Crew Belted Denim Boilersuit $90 (was $128, now 30% off) We like that this J. Crew denim boilersuit has a tie at the waist (for when you’d rather not direct attention to that particular area). $90 at J. Crew Buy with code: TGIFALL

J. Crew Wallace & Barnes Crewneck Sweater in Marled Italian Cotton $95 (was $158, now 40% off) A marled cotton sweater that (a) you won’t overheat in, and (b) you can machine wash. $95 at J. Crew Buy with code: TGIFALL

Chantelle Lingerie Soft Stretch Seamless French Cut Briefs $12 (was $20, now 40% off) These seamless briefs from Chantelle are supposedly extremely comfortable. $12 at Nordstrom Buy

Lands' End Women's Sweater Fleece Jacket $45 (was $70, now 36% off) Today (Friday) only, a whole bunch of Lands’ End clothes for men, women, and kids are on sale at Amazon, like this women’s zip-up fleece-slash-sweater. $45 at Amazon Buy

Lands' End Men's Bedford Rib Quarter Zip Sweater $28 (was $55, now 49% off) A real “casual Fridays” sweater right here. $28 at Amazon Buy

Lands' End Little Kids Fleece Quarter Zip $19 (was $30, now 37% off) This quarter-zip is also available for toddlers. $19 at Amazon Buy

Urban Decay Naked Cherry Highlight and Blush Palette $13 (was $34, now 62% off) Tacking this Urban Decay palette at the end, because it will surely sell out soon. $13 at Nordstrom Rack Buy

get the strategist newsletter Actually good deals, smart shopping advice, and exclusive discounts. Email Terms & Privacy Notice By submitting your email, you agree to our Terms and Privacy Notice and to receive email correspondence from us.

The Strategist is designed to surface the most useful, expert recommendations for things to buy across the vast e-commerce landscape. Some of our latest conquests include the best acne treatments, rolling luggage, pillows for side sleepers, natural anxiety remedies, and bath towels. We update links when possible, but note that deals can expire and all prices are subject to change.
description: A roundup of the week’s best deals including sales on Levi’s jeans, Nike sneakers, an Allswell mattress and more.
